languages.text: "В этом походе господин не нуждается в моих услугах. Мне было дано поручение прибраться". {n}Стоит слуге заговорить о Калькасаре, и почтительные, экстатические нотки расцвечивают его сухую речь.{/n}

"My master has no need of my services on his present expedition. I was tasked with cleaning up." {n}As soon as the conversation turns to Calcazar, deferential and ecstatic overtones brighten the servant's dry voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В этом походе господин не нуждается в моих услугах. Мне было дано поручение прибраться". {n}Стоит слуге заговорить о Калькасаре, и почтительные, экстатические нотки расцвечивают его сухую речь.{/n}

languages.text: “在这场远征中，我的主人不需要我的服务，因此我的任务是打扫卫生。”{n}一提到卡尔卡扎，仆人干涩的声音中就充满了恭敬与喜悦之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My master has no need of my services on his present expedition. I was tasked with cleaning up." {n}As soon as the conversation turns to Calcazar, deferential and ecstatic overtones brighten the servant's dry voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在这场远征中，我的主人不需要我的服务，因此我的任务是打扫卫生。”{n}一提到卡尔卡扎，仆人干涩的声音中就充满了恭敬与喜悦之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: 「私のご主人様は、現在の遠征に私を必要とされていません。私に与えられたお仕事は清掃です」{n}カルカサルの話題が出た途端、使用人の乾いた声に、恭順と恍惚のニュアンスが加わった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My master has no need of my services on his present expedition. I was tasked with cleaning up." {n}As soon as the conversation turns to Calcazar, deferential and ecstatic overtones brighten the servant's dry voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私のご主人様は、現在の遠征に私を必要とされていません。私に与えられたお仕事は清掃です」{n}カルカサルの話題が出た途端、使用人の乾いた声に、恭順と恍惚のニュアンスが加わった。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: «Mi amo no necesita mis servicios en su actual expedición. Estoy encargado de la limpieza». {n}En cuanto la conversación gira en torno a Calcazar, matices de respeto y euforia tiñen la voz seca del sirviente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My master has no need of my services on his present expedition. I was tasked with cleaning up." {n}As soon as the conversation turns to Calcazar, deferential and ecstatic overtones brighten the servant's dry voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi amo no necesita mis servicios en su actual expedición. Estoy encargado de la limpieza». {n}En cuanto la conversación gira en torno a Calcazar, matices de respeto y euforia tiñen la voz seca del sirviente.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Mein Master benötigt meine Dienste bei seiner aktuellen Expedition nicht. Ich habe die Aufgabe erhalten, hier aufzuräumen." {n}Sobald es um Calcazar geht, wird die trockene Stimme des Dieners von ehrfürchtigen und ekstatischen Tönen belebt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My master has no need of my services on his present expedition. I was tasked with cleaning up." {n}As soon as the conversation turns to Calcazar, deferential and ecstatic overtones brighten the servant's dry voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mein Master benötigt meine Dienste bei seiner aktuellen Expedition nicht. Ich habe die Aufgabe erhalten, hier aufzuräumen." {n}Sobald es um Calcazar geht, wird die trockene Stimme des Dieners von ehrfürchtigen und ekstatischen Tönen belebt.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « Mes services n'étaient pas requis pour cette expédition, mon maître m'a donc chargé de faire le ménage. » {n}À la mention de Calcazar, la voix du serviteur prend un ton respectueux proche de la vénération.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My master has no need of my services on his present expedition. I was tasked with cleaning up." {n}As soon as the conversation turns to Calcazar, deferential and ecstatic overtones brighten the servant's dry voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes services n'étaient pas requis pour cette expédition, mon maître m'a donc chargé de faire le ménage. » {n}À la mention de Calcazar, la voix du serviteur prend un ton respectueux proche de la vénération.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Efendimin hâlihazırda ilgilendiği mesele, benim hizmetlerimi gerektirmiyor. Temizlik yapmam istendi." {n}Calcazar konuşmaya konu olur olmaz hizmetkârın bunaltıcı sesi, hürmet ve saadet notalarıyla şenleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My master has no need of my services on his present expedition. I was tasked with cleaning up." {n}As soon as the conversation turns to Calcazar, deferential and ecstatic overtones brighten the servant's dry voice.{/n}
